EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314 - Q115.Invite - Sydney 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - Sydney
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/2015/sydney?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow> Join Pivotal technologists Wednesday, June 17 or Thursday June 18 and learn how to build and deploy great software on a modern cloud platform.
At this workshop, you’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal’s CF platform. In just a few hours, you’ll realize the speed and ease of pushing an application on Pivotal CF.
Who Should Attend
The workshops cover topics of interest to developers, architects, operations and technical managers. The keynotes set the stage for the workshops and will provide valuable insights for all.
AGENDA
8:30 AM – 9:00 AM
Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM – 10:00 AM
Keynote: Software Kept Eating the World
10:00 AM – 10:30 AM
Innovation: Who's Doing It Using PaaS?
10:30 AM – 10:45 AM
Morning Tea
10:45 AM – 12:00 PM
Lab 1 - The Developer Experience
12:00 PM – 12:30 PM
Lunch
12:30 PM – 2:00 PM
Workshop - Lab 2 - Architecture and the Operator Experience
Register <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/2015/sydney?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. Wednesday, June 17, 2015
OR
Thursday, June 18, 2015
Pivotal Office
Level 8, 175 Pitt St
Sydney REGISTER <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/2015/sydney?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow>
